items.sentence: Tom and Mary rented an apartment on Park Street.
Tom and Mary seem to be in love with each other.
Tom and Mary seem to be in some kind of trouble.
Tom and Mary stayed friends after they broke up.
Tom and Mary stopped and picked up a hitchhiker.
Tom just couldn\'t say no to an offer that good.
Tom broke the rules and was kicked off the team.
Tom brought his knife just in case he needed it.
Tom couldn\'t talk me out of going to the party.
Tom doesn\'t know anyone who is able to do that.
Tom picked up his glass and took a sip of water.
Tom picked up his stuff and walked out the door.
Tom didn\'t have anything else he wanted to say.
Tom didn\'t help Mary as much as he should have.
Tom didn\'t know for certain where he should go.
Tom didn\'t know for certain which road to take.
Tom didn\'t know he no longer needed to do that.
Tom knew there was nothing he could do about it.
Tom knows Mary better than he knows anyone else.
Tom leaned back in his chair and stared at Mary.
